casebody.data:
COURTNEY NC LLC
v.
BALDWIN 219P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 28, 2017 Monette Baldwin, for Baldwin, Monette. A. Bartlett White, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Stephanie D'Atri, Attorney at Law, for Courtney NC, LLC

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 17th of July 2017 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of September 2017."

Beasley, J. and Morgan, J. recused
